segment.source: Checklist Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Checklist Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO

segment.source: Checklist Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Checklist Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO

segment.source: Checklist: Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO
segment.target: Checklist: Create, Edit, and Deploy a GPO

segment.source: In an environment where multiple people change Group Policy Objects (GPOs) by using Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) delegates permission to Editors, Approvers, and Reviewers either as groups or as individuals.
segment.target: In an environment where multiple people change Group Policy Objects (GPOs) by using Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), an AGPM Administrator (Full Control) delegates permission to Editors, Approvers, and Reviewers either as groups or as individuals.

segment.source: The following is a typical GPO development process for an Editor and an Approver.
segment.target: The following is a typical GPO development process for an Editor and an Approver.

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Editor requests that a new GPO be created or an Approver creates a new GPO.
segment.target: Editor requests that a new GPO be created or an Approver creates a new GPO.

segment.source: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Create a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Create a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Approver approves the creation of the GPO if it was requested by an Editor.
segment.target: Approver approves the creation of the GPO if it was requested by an Editor.

segment.source: Approve or Reject a Pending Action
segment.target: Approve or Reject a Pending Action

segment.source: Editor checks out a copy of the GPO from the archive so that no one else can modify the GPO.
segment.target: Editor checks out a copy of the GPO from the archive so that no one else can modify the GPO.

segment.source: Editor makes changes to the GPO, and then checks the modified GPO into the archive.
segment.target: Editor makes changes to the GPO, and then checks the modified GPO into the archive.

segment.source: Edit a GPO Offline
segment.target: Edit a GPO Offline

segment.source: If developing in a test forest, Editor exports the GPO to a file, transfers the file to the production forest, and imports the file.
segment.target: If developing in a test forest, Editor exports the GPO to a file, transfers the file to the production forest, and imports the file.

segment.source: Additionally, an Editor can link the GPO to an organizational unit that contains test computers and users.
segment.target: Additionally, an Editor can link the GPO to an organizational unit that contains test computers and users.

segment.source: Using a Test Environment
segment.target: Using a Test Environment

segment.source: Editor requests deployment of the GPO to the production environment of the domain.
segment.target: Editor requests deployment of the GPO to the production environment of the domain.

segment.source: Request Deployment of a GPO
segment.target: Request Deployment of a GPO

segment.source: Reviewers, such as Approvers or Editors, analyze the GPO.
segment.target: Reviewers, such as Approvers or Editors, analyze the GPO.

segment.source: Performing Reviewer Tasks
segment.target: Performing Reviewer Tasks

segment.source: Approver approves and deploys the GPO to the production environment of the domain or rejects the GPO.
segment.target: Approver approves and deploys the GPO to the production environment of the domain or rejects the GPO.

segment.source: Approve or Reject a Pending Action
segment.target: Approve or Reject a Pending Action
